judges: Carni, Dejo, Lindley, Scudder, Seph, Troutman
case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Robert J. Sampson, Jr.

opinions.opinion_text:
Appeal from a judgment of the Jefferson County Court (Kim H. Martusewicz, J.), rendered August 5, 2013. The judgment convicted defendant, upon his plea of guilty, of burglary in the third degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from is unanimously affirmed.
Same memorandum as in People v Sampson ([appeal No. 1] 149 AD3d 1486 [2017]).
Present — Carni, J.P., Lindley, DeJo-seph, Troutman and Scudder, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
